title: Boss Fight
description: This is the second volume of the USA TODAY bestselling fantasy series combining the next three books— Heartache , Thicker Than Blood , and Magic to the Bone . Separated from her friends, their fates unknown, and without her magic, Jade must stop fighting on Samir’s terms or else her next battle will be her last.Level up. Or die.Jade Crow and her friends faced their worst enemy, her ex-boyfriend Samir, the most powerful sorcerer in the world, and they now lie defeated, and flung across the wilderness.Samir had trained Jade to be a sorceress, to mold her in his image, until she rejected him and escaped here to Wylde. Jade must stop fighting on Samir’s terms or else her next battle will be her last.Leveled up and wiser, Jade stands a chance this time, if she follows the true calling of her power, and changes the playing field. Everything has been leading up to this…Roll for initiative!This is the omnibus of the next three volumes in the USA TODAY bestselling fantasy series, Heartache ; Thicker Than Blood ; Magic to the Bone , collected together for the first time in print.
author: Annie Bellet
